scroll me
{
  "bounds": [800, 600],
  "children": [
    {
      "bounds": [800, 600],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "drawsContent": true,
      "children": [
        {
          "shouldFlattenTransform": false,
          "children": [
            {
              "position": [8, 8],
              "bounds": [20, 20]
            },
            {
              "position": [10, 8],
              "bounds": [400, 204],
              "drawsContent": true
            }
          ]
        }
      ]
    }
  ]
}
